GRSE Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Specialist Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 31, 2025, 17:07 IST
 Garden Reach Shipbuilders and Engineers Limited
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 31-Jul-2025 |  West Bengal |  Salary : 30,000 to 30,000




FOLLOW

Garden Reach Shipbuilders and Engineers Limited (GRSE) has declared the official notification to fill up the vacancies for Specialist Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the GRSE Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in West Bengal

GRSE Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Specialist	01	B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering

Age Limit for the GRSE Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age limit: 65 years.

Selection Process for the GRSE Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the GRSE Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 30,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the GRSE Recruitment 2025

For SC/ ST/ PWD Candidates: Nil
For all Other Candidates: Rs. 590 /- per month.
How to Apply for the GRSE Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the Recruitment or career page.
Check for the Specialist Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Upload the scanned required documents to the application form.
Pay the application fee. (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	30-07-2025
Last Date of Application	12-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
